New Records: Elly De La Cruz hit his 25th homer of the season
Key Match Events: Elly De La Cruz doubled with two outs and scored when Stephenson knocked a line-drive single to right field to give the Reds a 1-0 lead
Ty France followed with his 13th home run of the season, belting a curveball 426 feet over the wall in center to make it 3-0
Elly De La Cruz connected on a slider for his 25th homer to right field for a 6-0 lead
Billy Cook hit a leadoff home run for the Pirates to left-center field against reliever Alan Busenitz in the ninth
Post-Match Reflections: The Reds (76-80) have won five of their past eight games and took a 7-1 win and the series against the visiting Pittsburgh Pirates on Saturday
The Pirates (72-83) have lost seven of nine
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Reds took advantage of Pittsburgh starter Jared Jones in the fourth
Jones gave up six runs on six hits while striking out five in five innings
The Pirates had just five baserunners through the first four innings before threatening in the fifth
